name: avalynx-alert
title: AvalynxAlert
description: AvalynxAlert is a simple alert system for web applications. Based on Bootstrap >=5.3 without any framework dependencies.

author.name: Juergen Schwind an the Avalynx-Alert authors

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist; shx mkdir -p dist/js/; shx cp src/js/avalynx-alert.js dist/js/avalynx-alert.js; shx cp src/js/avalynx-alert.js dist/js/avalynx-alert.esm.js; node build.js dist/js/avalynx-alert.esm.js; shx mkdir -p dist/css/; shx cp src/css/avalynx-alert.css dist/css/avalynx-alert.css
